comment: 冒険心が高まり、新しいチャンスが次々と訪れる素晴らしい日！
sora_prompt: Create a stunning 10-second zodiac horoscope video. Scene: a centaur archer shooting a flaming arrow across a vast galaxy, stars exploding into constellations. In the sky above, a large glowing the Sagittarius zodiac glyph (♐, an arrow pointing up-right) shines as a celestial emblem. A large glowing golden text "1st" prominently displayed at the top center of the frame. Color palette: royal purple and indigo. Mood: adventurous, free, philosophical. Visual effects: golden sparkles and radiant light particles gently floating upward, warm golden glow surrounding the scene. The atmosphere should convey triumphant, majestic, radiant warmth. Style: cinematic, ethereal, anime-inspired celestial art. Camera: slow dramatic zoom with gentle orbit.
